characters.name: Mrs. Henderson
characters.description: Mrs. Henderson is the friendly librarian who loves helping others find books. She is knowledgeable about flowers and photography.

characters.name: Dina
characters.description: Dina is the owner of the neighborhood restaurant and Sophia's granddaughter.

characters.name: Sophia
characters.description: Sophia is Diana's grandmother. She doesn't remember much due to old age, but she is a kind and sweet person.
